entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times early this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 1:08 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 1:08 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:08 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
